data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Ubon Ratchathani words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,691,400 people living in Ubon Ratchathani through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, teach the 10,937 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Nyeu people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, encourage the 10,937 believers in Ubon Ratchathani to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Ubon Ratchathani who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand has a population of 1,691,400.

We estimate Ubon Ratchathani has 10,937 people who might know Jesus, 11,165 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,669,299 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ubon Ratchathani to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
